name: turn off the lights
description:
[about]

slimes seem to have wrecked the wiring in your house. whenever they appear in a room, the light turns on. you have 120s to try and keep the lights off because you care about the planet. don't scare the slimes though, they are afraid of the dark.

[^_^]

my very first game, made for the nokia 3310 jam!

[credits]

sound by trix
